from datetime import datetime

from django.db import models


class Article(models.Model):
    headline = models.CharField(max_length=100, default='Default headline')
    pub_date = models.DateTimeField(default=datetime.now)

    def __str__(self):

comments: callable defaults  you pass callable objects   default   parameter field  when object created without explicit value passed  django call method determine default value   this example uses   datetime datetime   default   pub date   field
content:
"""
Callable defaults

You can pass callable objects as the ``default`` parameter to a field. When
the object is created without an explicit value passed in, Django will call
the method to determine the default value.

This example uses ``datetime.datetime.now`` as the default for the ``pub_date``
field.
"""

from datetime import datetime

from django.db import models


class Article(models.Model):
    headline = models.CharField(max_length=100, default='Default headline')
    pub_date = models.DateTimeField(default=datetime.now)

    def __str__(self):
        return self.headline
description: The Web framework for perfectionists with deadlines.
